summary:
Senior Full Stack Software Engineer with 9+ years of experience in developing enterprise-level applications using Java, Spring Boot, Angular, and Flutter. Proven track record in designing and implementing scalable solutions for payment systems, e-commerce platforms, and mobile applications. Expertise in:

• Full Stack Development: Java, Spring Boot, Angular, TypeScript, Flutter
• Database Management: PostgreSQL, MongoDB, TimescaleDB, Oracle
• Cloud & DevOps: Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, Azure
• Mobile Development: Android (Kotlin/Java), iOS, Flutter
• Payment Systems: POS Applications, Payment Processing, Security Compliance

Demonstrated success in:
• Leading development teams of 5-8 engineers across multiple projects
• Reducing application load time by 40% through optimization
• Implementing microservices architecture resulting in 99.9% uptime
• Mentoring junior developers and promoting best practices

workExperience.title: Senior Full Stack Engineer
workExperience.description: Led development of mission-critical payment processing systems and mobile applications.
achievements: Architected and developed Paycell MPOS system processing 100K+ daily transactions
Reduced system response time by 35% through microservices implementation
Led migration of legacy systems to modern tech stack, improving maintainability by 60%
Served as Scrum Master for a team of 8 developers, achieving 95% sprint completion rate
Implemented CI/CD pipelines reducing deployment time from 2 hours to 15 minutes
Developed PTT Akıllı Esnaf platform serving 50K+ merchants nationwide

workExperience.title: Senior Frontend Engineer
workExperience.description: Led frontend development for Videotron BSS project, focusing on performance and user experience.
achievements: Developed responsive dashboard reducing customer service response time by 40%
Implemented state management using NGXS, improving application stability by 50%
Optimized application bundle size, reducing load time by 45%
Created reusable component library used across 3 major projects

workExperience.title: Senior Full Stack Engineer
workExperience.description: Developed enterprise procurement system for Istanbul Metropolitan Municipality.
achievements: Built REST API handling 10K+ daily requests with 99.9% uptime
Implemented secure QR-based authentication system for 1000+ users
Optimized database queries reducing response time by 30%

workExperience.title: Senior Mobile Engineer
workExperience.description: Led development of payment processing mobile applications.
achievements: Developed MPOS application for CSOB bank processing 50K+ daily transactions
Implemented cross-platform payment solution reducing development time by 40%
Created secure TapOnPhone solution compliant with PCI-DSS standards

workExperience.title: Full Stack Engineer
workExperience.description: Developed full-stack solutions for social media and ERP systems.
achievements: Built scalable REST APIs serving 100K+ daily active users
Implemented real-time chat system supporting 10K+ concurrent users
Reduced database query time by 50% through optimization
Integrated e-Invoice system processing 5K+ monthly transactions
Developed SSR-enabled Angular application improving SEO metrics by 80%
Focus on IT Management and Business Process Analysis
Relevant coursework: Database Management, System Analysis, IT Project Management

education.description: Core focus on Software Engineering and System Design
achievements: Completed intensive English preparation program
Relevant coursework: Data Structures, Algorithms, Software Engineering, Database Systems

projects.name: Enterprise Payment Processing System
projects.description: Designed and implemented a high-throughput payment processing system handling 100K+ daily transactions with 99.99% uptime. Implemented robust security measures and real-time monitoring.
achievements: Reduced transaction processing time by 40%
Implemented fraud detection reducing fraudulent transactions by 60%
Achieved PCI-DSS compliance certification

projects.name: Mobile POS Solution
projects.description: Developed cross-platform mobile POS application supporting multiple payment methods and real-time transaction processing.
achievements: Supported 50K+ merchants
Processed $10M+ in transactions
Achieved 4.8/5 app store rating

projects.name: Real-time Chat Platform
projects.description: Built scalable chat platform supporting text, voice, and video communication with end-to-end encryption.
achievements: Supported 10K+ concurrent users
Achieved sub-second message delivery
Implemented WebRTC for video calls
